attributes.action: honour John Hastings of Workington with an MBE for his charity work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr John Hastings of Workington has long been a valuable contributer to charities. We believe he should be honoured with an MBE

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
